name: The Oberoi Udaivilas
description: A luxurious resort set on the banks of Lake Pichola, offering grand architecture and exceptional hospitality.

name: Taj Lake Palace
description: A stunning white marble palace floating on Lake Pichola, known for its romantic ambiance and royal experience.

name: The Leela Palace
description: An epitome of luxury blending traditional Indian culture with modern amenities in the heart of the capital.

name: The Taj Mahal Palace
description: An iconic hotel overlooking the Arabian Sea, renowned for its historic significance and luxurious accommodations.

name: The Oberoi Amarvilas
description: Offers unparalleled views of the Taj Mahal from its rooms, complemented by Mughal-inspired architecture.

name: The Imperial New Delhi
description: A blend of Victorian charm and colonial elegance, this hotel is a landmark in the capital city.

name: The Oberoi Rajvilas
description: A royal resort set amidst lush gardens, offering a serene retreat with traditional Rajasthani architecture.

name: Rambagh Palace
description: Once a royal residence, now a luxurious hotel showcasing rich history and opulent interiors.

name: The Oberoi Vanyavilas
description: A luxury jungle resort offering tented accommodations near the Ranthambhore Tiger Reserve.

name: Taj Falaknuma Palace
description: Perched atop a hill, this palace hotel offers panoramic views of the city and a glimpse into Nizam's opulence.

name: The Oberoi Cecil
description: A heritage hotel in the Himalayan foothills, exuding colonial charm and offering breathtaking mountain views.

name: Wildflower Hall
description: A luxurious retreat nestled in the Himalayas, offering tranquility and stunning vistas.

name: The Leela Palace Udaipur
description: Overlooking Lake Pichola, this palace hotel combines traditional grandeur with modern luxury.

name: Umaid Bhawan Palace
description: One of the world's largest private residences, this palace offers a glimpse into royal living.

name: The Oberoi Grand
description: Known as the 'Grande Dame of Chowringhee,' it blends colonial charm with modern amenities.

name: The Leela Kovalam
description: A cliff-top beach resort offering panoramic views of the Arabian Sea and luxurious accommodations.

name: Taj Exotica Resort & Spa
description: A Mediterranean-style resort set on the pristine sands of Benaulim Beach, offering luxury and tranquility.

name: Taj Mahal Hotel
description: An elegant luxury hotel with stunning architecture located on Mansingh Road in the heart of the city.

name: ITC Grand Chola
description: A magnificent tribute to Southern India's architectural heritage, offering luxurious accommodations and fine dining.

name: Kumarakom Lake Resort
description: Traditional Kerala architecture meets modern luxury in this stunning lakeside resort in the backwaters.

name: Evolve Back, Coorg
description: A plantation retreat that offers luxury villas inspired by local Kodava architecture amidst coffee plantations.

name: The Tamara Coorg
description: Luxury cottages built on stilts amidst coffee plantations offering a premium nature retreat experience.

name: Taj Bekal Resort & Spa
description: A serene sanctuary inspired by Kerala's Kettuvallam houseboats with private plunge pools.

name: Alila Fort Bishangarh
description: A 230-year-old warrior fort transformed into a luxurious heritage resort with stunning views.

name: The Serai
description: A luxury desert camp and spa offering tented suites amidst the Thar Desert landscape.

name: Suryagarh
description: A magnificent yellow sandstone hotel that brings alive the grandeur of Rajasthan's royal heritage.

name: The Lalit Grand Palace
description: A former royal residence offering panoramic views of the Dal Lake and surrounding mountains.

name: Coconut Lagoon
description: A heritage resort offering traditional Kerala homes and cottages in the heart of the backwaters.

name: Ahilya Fort
description: A heritage hotel overlooking the sacred Narmada River, once the royal residence of the Holkar dynasty.

name: Samode Palace
description: A 475-year-old palace featuring Indo-Saracenic architecture and exquisite hand-painted murals.

name: Raas Devigarh
description: An 18th-century palace transformed into a luxury heritage hotel with minimalist contemporary interiors.

name: Taj Fisherman's Cove
description: A luxury beach resort on the Coromandel Coast, built on the ramparts of an old Dutch fort.

name: Evolve Back, Kabini
description: A wildlife resort offering a pristine jungle experience with luxury accommodations along the Kabini River.

name: Taj Nadesar Palace
description: A colonial era palace set amidst mango orchards and jasmine fields, offering royal hospitality.

name: The Oberoi Sukhvilas
description: A luxury spa resort combining traditional elements with contemporary design in the Siswan Forest Range.

name: The Westin Pushkar Resort & Spa
description: A luxury desert retreat offering private pool villas with panoramic views of the Aravalli mountains.

name: Taj Malabar Resort & Spa
description: A waterfront heritage hotel offering breathtaking views of Cochin harbor and the Arabian Sea.

name: ITC Grand Goa Resort & Spa
description: A luxury beach resort inspired by Indo-Portuguese village architecture spread across 45 acres of landscaped gardens.

name: Stok Palace Heritage Hotel
description: A 200-year-old royal palace offering traditional Ladakhi hospitality with stunning mountain views.

name: The Khyber Himalayan Resort & Spa
description: A luxury mountain resort nestled amidst pine forests offering breathtaking views of the Affarwat peaks.

name: The Leela Palace Bangalore
description: A garden palace inspired by the architectural style of the Royal Palace of Mysore, set amidst lush gardens.

name: Taj Coral Reef Resort & Spa
description: A luxury beach resort offering overwater villas on the pristine beaches of Havelock Island.

name: Jehan Numa Palace
description: A heritage hotel built in 1890, offering colonial charm with modern amenities in the heart of the city.

name: Mayfair Darjeeling
description: A luxury heritage property offering colonial charm with panoramic views of the Himalayas and tea gardens.

name: Devi Garh by Lebua
description: An 18th-century fortress palace restored into a luxury heritage hotel with contemporary minimalist design.

name: Chamba Camp Thiksey
description: A luxury glamping experience offering nomadic lifestyle with unparalleled views of the Himalayas.

name: The Oberoi Bengaluru
description: An urban oasis set amid tropical gardens and a century-old rain tree in the heart of the city.

name: Ananda in the Himalayas
description: A luxury spa resort located in the Himalayan foothills, focused on holistic wellness and Ayurveda.

name: Bujera Fort
description: A recently built fort featuring traditional Rajasthani architecture with modern comforts and lake views.

name: The LaLiT Temple View Khajuraho
description: A luxury hotel offering views of the Western Group of Temples, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
